author: Sharon Meagher
quote: Truly Cathoel Jorss your writing is like a spring of tenderness.

author: Romana Challens
quote: You add so much richness to my life.

author: Stephen Cole
quote: It is a pleasure to watch you work through these difficult issues of our time.
Your words and images bring me comfort in this world full of noise.
author: Michelle Stevens!

quote: In my opinion, you will be one of the greatest artists this country has produced.
author: Bob ‘King’ Crawford

quote: I feel your deep strength.
author: Naoko Nakamura

quote: Incredible writing, breathtaking in its courage.
author: Candy Royalle

quote: Your words are an elixir for my life ache.
author: Samantha Potter

quote: You feel it acutely and say it clearly for all of us. I salute you.
author: Alison Lambert

quote: Brave and loving and all kinds of wonderful.
author: Heather Marsh

quote: Such an inspiration to so many people.
author: Carol Lefevre

quote: The wonderful warrior Cathoel.
author: Willem Broekma

quote: You are a hero, a light on the hill!
author: Bronny Phoenix

quote: This made me cry. I love your writing. You really are exquisite.
author: Kate Forster

quote: God, you make me laugh! Your turn of phrase is delightful.
author: Kate Forster!

quote: Madame Wordsmith.
author: David Cotter

quote: You really know how to take the reader on a journey.
author: Atum Amandla

quote: Your story made me bawl.
author: Victoria Fitch

quote: You are a fucking Amazon.
author: Grottie Locket

quote: Cathoel Jorss is one of the most beautiful souls on this planet. My conscience of the best sorts.
author: Aubrey Harper

quote: Thoughtful, eloquent, poetic, and concise.
author: Mia Armitage

quote: What a powerful and piercing story. Too many people are ashamed to even broach these subjects. You are a daily inspiration.
author: Vira Sachenko.

quote: A true warrior for love & spirit and human/children’s rights. A luminescent wonderful writer, and music maker.
author: Bronwyn Evans

quote: Wow you are one of the most open minded people I know.
author: Andrea Fraser

quote: Heartbreaking experience retold with fairness and honesty, and it’s a testament to something stout and noble in your soul.
author: James Hart

quote: I’m turning it over and over again, just can’t stop listening. It’s fabulous. And it’s a blast. Your songs are full of juice. Thanks!
author: Uros Stern

quote: Your song is wild!!! Jazzy, funky, very cool.
author: HexStatic

quote: Intriguing short stories and gem vignettes.
author: Balkan Falcons

quote: How many times have I stopped in the supermarket and thought: what would Cathoel do? Answer: a lot.
author: Jamila James Barry

quote: Cathoel’s writing is a constant inspiration to me.
author: Jennie Hill

quote: Beautiful observations.
author: Sophie Burnham

quote: Cathoel has a way of leaving me mute.
author: Russell Obst

quote: We love your work, great spinning Cathoel Jorss. Rad candour, audacity and searing honesty.
author: Harro Watjen

quote: Beautiful words from my favourite poet. You ground and comfort me by simply being.
author: Nick Rose

quote: Sincerity and vulnerability in every word.
author: Sabine Symply

quote: So witty!!
author: Obelia Modjeska

quote: Grateful tears. Thanks Cathoel.
author: Elle Kaye

quote: Cathoel. My long-distance ladycrush. Writer, songstress, bastion of democracy
author: Deborah Farrell

quote: My God. What a beautiful story. I’ve read it three times already and don’t plan on stopping there. Absolutely enchanting, I can’t wait to read more!
author: Julia Mitton

quote: The deep beauty of your soul shines brightly
author: Sherry Johnson

quote: The wonderful Australian author and musician Cathoel Jorss.
author: Martin Oppermann

quote: Who is the greatest next artist? My personal opinion: you are in the running
author: Tom Tonkin

quote: Listening and watching you sing was like falling in love.
author: Slawek Supski

quote: The hairs on my arms stand up when I read her work.
author: Bec Fitzpatrick

quote: Apt and startlingly relevant.
author: Sydney Wayland Smith

quote: What you’ve put to words is really extraordinary. Brave, brave Cathoel.
author: Mark Rogers

quote: Cathoel for president!
author: Jane Roper

quote: You consistently offer the best commentary on the human condition I read anywhere. Let me know when you are published. I'll buy two copies.
author: Gregory Cardinal Dilley

quote: Your music, your lyrics, your writing, your vibration will be with me all my life Cathoel — favourites all. Your vibration resonates with my being. A pleasure to walk with you.
author: Jeff Foley

quote: Unabated power.
author: Stephen Cole

quote: Oh Cathoel, you deep genius. Beam brighter.
author: Thom Woodruff

quote: You’re a shiny shiny gem, Cathoel.
author: Chelsea Avard

quote: A pure work of art.
author: Diane McLaughlin

quote: I love your vision/s and expression. You paint pictures inside my mind & I adore you for it.
author: Garry Crook

quote: You are so gorgeous, spiritually, intellectually and physically.
author: Megan Green

quote: So beautifully written, my heart shifted.
author: Leila Simon Boakes

quote: I’m all goosebumps. Your writing is exquisite. Your comradeship means the world to me.
author: Kandelka Koreovit

quote: Bless you, bless your gift of writing, thank you so much for sharing it, Cathoel; I am touched and a little teary x
author: Dawn Albinger

quote: Without your creativity, the universe is lacking.
author: Chris Waites

quote: My heart is always with you and your words are in my heart.
author: Brendan Kelly

quote: The world is a better place for having you here.
author: Aubrey Harper

quote: I cannot thank you enough for your words, they have changed my whole perspective on grief. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
author: Victoria Strike

quote: I want to eat some of these photographs.
author: Wwhorhey Lorzeno

quote: Thank you for your imagery and your clear, deep, vulnerable wisdom.
author: Sophie Thompson

quote: Wow. I was there. I was with you. It was the greatest experience of my life.
author: Megan Green

quote: Writing both intimate and crystalline.
author: Raymond Evans

quote: You see the beauty in me and appreciate it. You are such an adorable creature and we appreciate you so much.
author: Nana Kwame Esel

quote: Your bravery helped me get over my scaredness and stand up for women.
author: Eliza AC

quote: In the bowl of life, you are the peppercorns.
author: TJ Hunter

quote: This is the most accurate and insightful assessment of racism I ever heard! I wish more American Blacks could see this.
author: Infinity Joelle

quote: You always make people feel good about themselves.
author: Michelle Stevens

quote: You are a wonderful, warm, kind and caring person Cathoel and I hope your friends and family remind you of that every day. Love your soul!
author: Red Bingham

quote: Your writing is exquisite. I stepped into where you're living. Thank you!
author: Russell Krass

quote: What you’ve just written will become my nightly prayer.
author: Alex Smith

quote: Dedicated to Cathoel Jorss’s eternal light: thank you, for your activism, Cathoel.
author: Bronny Phoenix

quote: I miss you Cathoel like I miss my cat.
author: Gary Baumgarten

quote: Amazing and brave and unapologetic and wild and powerful and beautiful. Travel well wild woman and thank you.
author: Elizabeth Bartram

quote: Utterly brilliant as ever: the divinely creative Cathoel Jorss, a traveller and an inspiratrix.
author: Kate Forster

quote: You are so sincere and brilliant.
author: Charlie Rae

quote: A very powerful writer.
author: Miranda Field

quote: I've liked you since before I knew you.
author: Heather Taylor Johnson

quote: Thank you for your relentless activism for women. Thank you for ignoring or dealing with what I expect must be a relentless tide of hate. I am not strong enough for that battle. I am grateful you are. I’m crying as I write this.
author: Megan Anne

quote: This is beloved friend of mine Cathoel Jorss. My conscience of the best sorts.
author: Aubrey Harper

quote: Tall, stunning, and physically vibrant; exceptional intellect, creativity and emotional clarity: you’re something else. Alpha plus.
author: Cherry Austin

quote: The business. I dig it indeed. Thank you for this brilliance, Cathoel Jorss.
author: Matthew Simpson-Morgan

quote: A hidden richness waiting to be discovered. I salute you for your fight on this issue!
author: Claudia Clara Vera

quote: A real amount of contained emotion.
author: James Hendry

quote: Bravo for your compassion and eloquence on this subject.
author: Susanna Nelson

quote: You’re such an honestly extraordinarily open-hearted, pure-hearted, wise, self-aware, selfresponsible, kind, brave, strong and vulnerable person.
author: Christine Grodd

quote: A true warrior for love & spirit and human/children’s rights. A luminescent wonderful writer, and music maker.
author: Bronwyn Evans

quote: Her words are always, invariably beautiful.
author: Esther Essinger

quote: What a wonderful clear mind you have!
author: Robyn Foskett

quote: Really profound thoughts.
author: Tammy McCrory

quote: The total impression is of a first rate artist at work..
author: Kerry Leves, Overland
